about_the_game:
Road to Top G is an intense and action-packed game that combines the thrilling elements of a zombie survival game with the added twist of defeating the notorious antagonist Top G. In this game, players are tasked with surviving relentless waves of zombies and ultimately confronting the formidable Top G in an epic boss battle.

The gameplay revolves around the player's journey with hordes of undead creatures. To reach the final confrontation, players must demonstrate their survival skills and reach Wave 10, unlocking the elusive boss door. Each wave presents increasingly challenging hordes of zombies, requiring players to strategically utilize their resources and abilities to stay alive.

Are you ready to take on Road to Top G and face the infamous boss in a battle for survival and dominance? The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes: In the boss fight the bosses may use some words that can offend sensitve people but it is for meme purposes, (please do not take it seriously).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 960 gtx
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Survive waves of zombies, collect perks, unlock boss door, and face the Top G in an intense showdown.
